name: cyber-scrolling-platformer-by-creatordynamite
description:
use w,a,s,d for movement and jump collect coind as you can..

welcome again buddies!!! creatordynamite here ! welcome to cloud multiplayer platformer !!! here you can play with friends and family and with siblings ?? 

as i am working on it to make it better updates will come

current version = 1.2v

upcoming updates: 

31st dec 2022 1.2.1:making multiplayer

1 jan 2023 1.3v : added new look to opponent and added throwable items to play in community.

3 jan 2023 1.3.1v: fixed bugs. this time the game will be in maintance mode you will can't find the game.

5 jan 2023 best update but take lot of effort ? 1.3.2:others levels and community room for everyone and player number increase and mobile support.this can delay or some features can be delayed.
